images.caption: Figure 1.We introduce ComfyUI-R1, a large reasoning model for automated workflow generation.Given a user instruction, ComfyUI-R1 performs long chain-of-thought reasoning to generate a code representation of a ComfyUI workflow. The generated workflow adheres to the correct format, executes successfully, and produces an image that aligns with the user’s instruction. ComfyUI-R1 is integrated inhttps://github.com/AIDC-AI/ComfyUI-Copilot.

Figure 3.Comparison between ComfyAgent and our ComfyUI-R1.The execution result of ComfyUI-R1 accurately adheres to the “anime-style” and “cartoon” attributes in the user instruction. In contrast, ComfyAgent fails to follow these stylistic guidelines.
Figure 4.Case study: multi-image combination.Here ComfyUI-R1 seamlessly combines the input images by generating a correct and executable workflow.
Figure 5.Case study: multi-image combination (continued).This figure shows the workflow and the corresponding execution result generated by ComfyAgent(Xue et al.,2024).
Figure 6.An illustration of the task categories in our constructed workflow KB, including the subcategories under image editing.
